p: Interferon (IFN) subtypes were previously examined in the treatment of SARS and MERS. Primary in vitro experience showed antiviral effects of IFNs, especially IFN-β and IFN-γ, on SARS-CoV ( 9). The same results were reported for IFN-β against MERS-CoV ( 10, 11). Later, in an animal model, higher antiviral activity of IFN-β compared to that of lopinavir-ritonavir was shown against MERS-CoV ( 12). The efficacy of IFN-β on MERS is still being investigated ( 13).
